verses.kjv: The king shall joy in thy strength, O LORD; and in thy salvation how greatly shall he rejoice!
verses.ct: LORD, the king finds joy in your strength! How deeply he celebrates your salvation!

verses.kjv: Thou hast given him his heart’s desire, and hast not withholden the request of his lips. Selah.
verses.ct: You have granted him everything his heart desired, and you have not refused what his lips asked for. Selah.

verses.kjv: For thou preventest him with the blessings of goodness: thou settest a crown of pure gold on his head.
verses.ct: You met him with rich blessings of goodness; you placed a crown of pure gold on his head.

verses.kjv: He asked life of thee, and thou gavest it him, even length of days for ever and ever.
verses.ct: He asked you for life, and you gave it to him — long days that stretch on forever and ever.

verses.kjv: His glory is great in thy salvation: honour and majesty hast thou laid upon him.
verses.ct: His glory is immense because of your salvation; you have clothed him with honor and majesty.

verses.kjv: For thou hast made him most blessed for ever: thou hast made him exceeding glad with thy countenance.
verses.ct: You have made him blessed forever; you have filled him with overwhelming joy in your presence.

verses.kjv: For the king trusteth in the LORD, and through the mercy of the most High he shall not be moved.
verses.ct: Because the king trusts in the LORD, and through the mercy of the Most High, he will never be shaken.

verses.kjv: Thine hand shall find out all thine enemies: thy right hand shall find out those that hate thee.
verses.ct: Your hand will track down all your enemies; your right hand will reach those who hate you.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt make them as a fiery oven in the time of thine anger: the LORD shall swallow them up in his wrath, and the fire shall devour them.
verses.ct: You will make them like a blazing furnace when your anger appears. The LORD will consume them in his wrath, and fire will devour them.

verses.kjv: Their fruit shalt thou destroy from the earth, and their seed from among the children of men.
verses.ct: You will wipe out their descendants from the earth and their offspring from among humanity.

verses.kjv: For they intended evil against thee: they imagined a mischievous device, which they are not able to perform.
verses.ct: Though they plotted evil against you and devised wicked schemes, they could not carry them out.

verses.kjv: Therefore shalt thou make them turn their back, when thou shalt make ready thine arrows upon thy strings against the face of them.
verses.ct: So you will make them turn and run when you aim your arrows directly at them.

verses.kjv: Be thou exalted, LORD, in thine own strength: so will we sing and praise thy power.
verses.ct: Rise up in your strength, LORD! We will sing and celebrate your power.
